arguments.name: closed
arguments.description: Whether the poll is closed and doesn't accept any more answers

arguments.name: publicVoters
arguments.description: Whether cast votes are publicly visible to all users (non-anonymous poll)

arguments.name: multipleChoice
arguments.description: Whether multiple options can be chosen as answer

arguments.name: quiz
arguments.description: Whether this is a quiz (with wrong and correct answers, results shown in the return type)

arguments.name: closePeriod
arguments.description: Amount of time in seconds the poll will be active after creation, 5-600. Can't be used together with close_date.

arguments.name: closeDate
arguments.description: Point in time (UNIX timestamp in seconds) when the poll will be automatically closed. Must be at least 5 and no more than 600 seconds in the future; can't be used together with close_period.
